job_purpose: Design software and control systems that integrate with multiple hardware systems across residential and commercial applications within Seeley International's Imagineering team.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design software and control systems for new 'over-the-horizon' products and manufacturing systems
Integrate software with various hardware systems in residential and commercial applications
Collaborate with a team of engineers from different disciplines
Receive coaching and training for professional development
Contribute directly to the development of new products
required_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering or Computer Science
Minimum of two years of professional software engineering experience
Experience with modern software development and scripting languages
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Trustworthy with a positive work attitude
High degree of personal and professional integrity
preferred_qualifications: Experience with Atlassian tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)
Familiarity with Git or other version control tools
Knowledge of OSI model and TCP/IP stack
Understanding of open data communications protocols (e.g., BACnet, Modbus, MQTT)
company_details: Seeley International is one of Australia's largest manufacturers of energy-efficient heating, cooling, and ventilation products. With a legacy of over 50 years, Seeley is known for iconic brands like Climate Wizard, Breezair, Braemar, Aira, and Coolair. The company is committed to innovation and providing premium climate control solutions.
